name: managx-health
description: Basic health data management, including user management, medical records, and appointments, with a focus on safety and authentication.

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run --workspace frontend start" "npm run --workspace backend start"
scripts.build: npm run --workspace frontend build && npm run --workspace backend build
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
